body:
https://youtu.be/NvoWBbYxdwc
Watch the video all the way through its at most 10 mins. No joke I almost cried. Opinions on this below?

title: Almost cried

replies.body: I've watched many videos like these. Truly shocking and inspiring.
replies.body_tagged: I've watched many videos like these. Truly shocking and inspiring.

replies.body: Yes, and also lets you know how many ***************************************************** like these there are. Needed to let some rage out :I

replies.body:
Just like Every other social shit on Youtube, it's fake.

Or 

They obviously dont care about the homeless, they are the ones making money of the video.
replies.body_tagged:
Just like Every other social shit on Youtube, it's fake.

replies.body:
Can't take it srsly when there are ads on the video. I'll guess it's fake, as Robin said


btw the music they used just made you cry, I'm sure with muting the video you wouldn't have cried.
replies.body_tagged:
Can't take it srsly when there are ads on the video. I'll guess it's fake, as Robin said

replies.body:
Fake or not, the homeless guy still got his money and believes that people still care about him.

You guys view it as fake, I view it as a win win win. One for the YT guys, one for the homeless man and call me cheesy but one for society.
replies.body_tagged:
Fake or not, the homeless guy still got his money and believes that people still care about him.

You guys view it as fake, I view it as a win win win. One for the YT guys, one for the homeless man and call me cheesy but one for society.

replies.body: It's disappointing to see what our society has become to, a police officer slapping a homeless man and a man pouring food over him. It's also funny because both are able bodied people who can find a job lol, yet they refuse to help the man and only help the boy. :/
replies.body_tagged: It's disappointing to see what our society has become to, a police officer slapping a homeless man and a man pouring food over him. It's also funny because both are able bodied people who can find a job lol, yet they refuse to help the man and only help the boy. :/

replies.body:
I really found that video helpful to make people understand how poors feel. I wish there wouldn't be any sad, homeless or hungary people. But I think that we should respect, help and understand them. Anyways, maybe these guys are doing this video to earn money, but they give him money, make people understand how they feel. If the guy who made this video made me cry, or simply understand them, THIS IS A HELPFUL VIDEO TO UNDERSTAND HOW THEY FELL. 

-Yeah, they can apply for a job, but it doesn't mean that We'll not help 'em.  Let me see your ideas...
